title: [Large-scale] Inclusive Research Project Collaboration Competency Strengthening Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics concepts and teamwork experience
context.additional_context: Conducting Mathematics Research Projects Through Collaboration with Experienced Experts (Including Persons with Disabilities)

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more math problem-solving strategies reflecting experienced practitioners' perspectives in inclusive collaborative environments
Learners can reduce collaborative conflicts by 30% by applying protocols for effective communication with experienced practitioners at each research project stage
Learners can design and implement trust-building activities (relationship-building, feedback routines) among participants to create safe collaborative spaces
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
